trans-unit.source: Represents the data of a property for a selected item and enables editing of this property with type-specific data.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> class.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> class.
The parent <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" />.

Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> class that serves as a subproperty of the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" />.
For host infrastructure derived classes.
trans-unit.target: ホスト インフラストラクチャの派生クラスで使用します。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" /> to apply.
Stores whether the target property value matches a specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" />.
Gets the name of the category in which this property resides.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the name of the category.
trans-unit.target: カテゴリの名前を含む <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Enables the host infrastructure to create a new host-specific <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" /> instance.
A new <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" /> object.
Gets the description of the encapsulated property.
A string that contains the description.
Gets the display name for the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" />.
A string that contains the display name.

Declaration of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget" /> event, which occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" /> is changed through a call to the <see cref="M:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.ApplyFilter(System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter)" /> method.
Gets a value that indicates whether a set of standard values is available for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" />.
<see langword="true" /> if a set of standard values is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 標準値のセットがある場合それ以外の場合、<see langword="false" />です。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> is custom-made.
<see langword="true" /> if the property entry is custom-made; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> プロパティのエントリがカスタム作成; の場合それ以外の場合、<see langword="false" />です。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" /> is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if the property entry is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> プロパティのエントリが読み取り専用の場合それ以外の場合、<see langword="false" />です。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget" /> matches the filter.

Sets the value to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget" /> matches the filter and fires the event handler method for the property change.
<see langword="true" /> if the target object matches the filter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> ターゲット オブジェクトです。 フィルターに一致する場合それ以外の場合、<see langword="false" />です。

trans-unit.source: The `PropertyContainer` listens to changes made to this property.
trans-unit.target: `PropertyContainer` は、このプロパティに対する変更をリッスンします。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> display or type name of a filter to match against the target object.

Implementation of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget" /> method that determines whether the target display or type name matches the specified string containing the name of a filter.
<see langword="true" /> if the target display or type name matches the specified string; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" /> to apply.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.FilterApplied" /> event.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.PropertyChanged" /> event.
The EventArgs for this event.
Raises the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged" /> PropertyChanged event.
The name of the property whose value has changed.

Raises the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged" /> event when the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer" /> hears that the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" /> has changed.
Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" /> in classes derived from a host infrastructure.
A parent <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" />.
This is used only for subproperties, so its value can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: これはのみの使用、サブプロパティをその値ができるように`null`です。

trans-unit.source: Declaration of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged" /> event, which occurs when a property value changes.
Gets the name of the property.
A string that contains the property name.
trans-unit.target: プロパティ名を含む文字列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the property.
A type that contains the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: プロパティの型を含む型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue" /> object.

Gets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor" /> that is used for editing the value of this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor" /> object that contains the current editor.
trans-unit.target: 現在のエディターを含む <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor" /> オブジェクト。

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of possible values supported by this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of possible values.
trans-unit.target: 使用可能な値を示す <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />。
